text: Geissanthus is a genus of shrubs and trees in the family Primulaceae. There are 51 species distributed in South America, with 25 of them in forests of the Andes.Geissanthus. Arboles y Arbustos de los Andes del Ecuador. eFloras. Species include: * Geissanthus challuayacus Pipoly * Geissanthus ecuadorensis Mez * Geissanthus fallenae Lundell * Geissanthus pichinchae Mez * Geissanthus pinchinchana (Lundell) Pipoly * Geissanthus spectabilis Pipoly * Geissanthus vanderwerffii Pipoly ==References== Category:Primulaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Geissanthus
